description: BuildAura is a comprehensive Building Management System (BMS) designed to streamline the management of a single building. This platform caters to not only user and admin functionalities but also member functionalities, ensuring a seamless experience for all stakeholders.
features: Members pay rent online and track payments.
Admin posts announcements, creates coupons, and manages requests.

description: BlissBite is a community-driven platform dedicated to reducing food waste and promoting food sharing. Our mission is to create a world where surplus food finds its way to those in need, fostering a spirit of generosity and sustainability.
features: Post, update, and remove food donations.

description: ArtNest is a vibrant online platform dedicated to the celebration and sharing of artistic creations, specifically in the realms of painting and drawing. ArtNest serves as a creative hub where artists can showcase their work, discover other artists, and engage with a community that cherishes the visual arts.
features: View artwork details, ratings, and prices.

description: DreamDwell is an innovative online platform designed to simplify the process of buying and renting properties, providing a seamless experience for both buyers and sellers. With a user-friendly interface and a comprehensive database of residential properties, DreamDwell makes it easy for users to find their dream home or investment property.
features: Add properties to cart for comparison.
